data.name: OTHERWAR - Buy me a coffee - DLC
data.detailed_description:
CONTENT

- mini art book and unused art


Thank you for the purchase

As it is "support the dev DLC" it won't add anything to the base game.

Disclaimer:
By purchasing this DLC you don't own the rights to use the assets from it for commercial or non commercial video game project.
